titleStmt.title: Whereas the fish-market at Billingsgate, by reason of the dismal fire and other accidents, hath for some late years been in much disorder, and yet continues without that due regulation ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).
Ford, Richard, Sir, d. 1678.

notesStmt.note: Title from first four lines of text.
At head of title: Ford mayor. Martis 17. die Januarii 1670. Annoque regni Regis Caroli Secundi, Angliæ, &c. vicesimo secundo.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
